description:
Chinkyuu Koudai was Ryofu`s best friend from her childhood, and also her lesbian lover. She was a C-rank with great potential.
She was caught during her attempt to steal the Gyokuji to give as a gift to Ryofu. Raped by Rikaku on Kaku`s orders, she later succumbs to her injuries.
name: Chinkyuu Koudai
